attributes.action: Allow any person to legally and rightfully have their birth day as a paid holiday/service day/extra day free from work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is pretty self explanatory, i feel you should be legally entitled NOT to work or be required to work on you actual birth date. This would be as it is displayed on your birth certificate/hospital of birth/place of birth etc and would omit you from doing any work related activities on that day, your special day.

This would be without retribution, grievance or vindication from employers and would be seen as a celebration rather than an excuse for absenteeism from work.

Hold your head high and vote for an extra day off so you may celebrate your birth day and share it with those around you or just relax with your feet up seeing as you would officially one year older!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
